concept.title: Features of the DITA Open Toolkit
concept.shortdesc: The DITA Open Toolkit is primarily a publishing tool – it is intended to convert DITA content into various output formats. This topic describes which versions of DITA are supported as input; it also describes the output formats available in a default installation.

section.title: Supported versions of DITA
section.p: The toolkit supports all standard versions of DITA, including 1.0, 1.1, and 1.2. In addition, it will still process documents that were written according to the pre-OASIS version of DITA, often called "dita132".
